left.title: Keep Your Address Safe!
left.content: Your home address is sensitive information. Sharing it online can be risky and even unsafe. Always ask parents or legal guardians before sharing!

right.title: Game Channel = Public Playground
right.content: Be careful what you share in the game channel. Sharing your address there is like announcing it loudly in a public playground.
